title: Postal Service: Sending Items (Usefulness 3)
description: Traveler usefulness 3/10 phrases for the Sending Items subcategory within Postal Service. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Yesterday I wrote a letter to my friend.
cards.romaji: Kino tomodachi ni tegami o kakimashita.
cards.japanese: 昨日友達に手紙を書きました。
